item.title: LeetCode 121: Best time to buy and sell stock
item.description: LeetCode 121: Best time to buy and sell stock For this problem we need to find the indices $i$ and $j$ , maximising the equation $prices[j] - prices[i]$, given $j > i$. Lets first approach the brute force solution of this problem. 1. Brute force: Complexity: $O(n^2)$ This is pretty straight forward. We iterate through the entire array and for each element we check the difference between the indices larger than the current index.
